gobblin.compaction.mapreduce

Class MRCompactorJobRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compaction.mapreduce.MRCompactorJobRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<MRCompactorJobRunner>, Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MRCompactorAvroKeyDedupJobRunner

    public abstract class MRCompactorJobRunner
extends Object
implements Runnable, Comparable<MRCompactorJobRunner>
    This class is responsible for configuring and running a single MR job. It should be extended by a subclass that properly configures the mapper and reducer related classes. The properties that control the number of reducers are compaction.target.output.file.size and compaction.max.num.reducers. The number of reducers will be the smaller of [total input size] / [compaction.target.output.file.size] + 1 and [compaction.max.num.reducers]. If is set to true, does not launch an MR job. Instead, just copies the files present in to a 'late' subdirectory within the output directory.
